entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Buffalo Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Buffalo Narrows Airport 07:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

Pressure: 103.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
